column4: Hey quick question im trying to install 9.04 but no video shows up, I have a 9600gt, i know appending vesa to the grub line which worked before 9.04 but no go now.  I'm aware of the altnerate install cd however i dont have any spare blank cds, ive tried deb bootstrap, and a usb flash drive and no go booting it up, is there any option i can append to get it to go to vesa on the live installer?
Curious sudo rm -fv /etc/X11/xorg.conf, and it will generate a blank one and if that doesnt work sudo rmmod nvidia
i originaly installed xubuntu did the desktop upgrade to ubuntu intrepid then just yesterday upgraded in synaptic to 9.04..
